title: Comeback Handaxe
content:
in special Actions while holding it.

This loyal axe always returns to its owner after being thrown. However, it has no eyes and therefore dreadful aim, inevitably returing to its thrower blade-end-first.

BG3 Comeback Handaxe Information

Range: 1.5 Despite its description, this hand axe does not return to its owner.

BG3 Comeback Handaxe Location & Where to Find

Location: One of the prize from Akabi's Wheel of Fortune. Circus of the Last Days

Comeback Handaxe Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Un
